detail_desc: Wide, straight-cut blouse in a crinkled, viscose weave with gathered draping. V-neck with ties at the front and a yoke. V-shaped opening at the back of the neck and large, wide balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and covered button at the cuffs.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats at the front. Double yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Imitation suede monkstraps with a decorative tab with elastic and a metal buckle, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the bikini top’s outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Shirt jacket in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs, welt side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Satin nightslip with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Decorative ties and lace details at the back and a lace trim at the hem.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thigh boots in soft leather with decorative seams, covered heels, and a zip on the inside at the bottom of the shaft. Satin linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Shirt in a soft, airy, cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, an open chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Straight, slightly wider fit with a gently rounded hem.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an ankle-height shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the top and reflective details. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with thin hoops. Sizes from 2-4.2 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake pockets at the back and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short blouse in cotton voile with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed button on the inside. 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathers at the top and narrow elastication and a flounce at the hems. Seam at the hem with smocking at the back and ties at one side.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Fully lined print-patterned swimsuits with a flounce at the top and narrow shoulder straps. One of the swimsuits also has decorative bows.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Mules in imitation leather with crossover straps at the front, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft rib knit. Hat with foldover ribbing and a pompom on top.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with wide elastic gores in the sides and loops on the shaft. Linings and insoles in faux shearling made from recycled polyester. Height of soles 4 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a textured weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Straight-cut dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a drawstring and small frill trim around the neckline and an opening at the top. Wide, raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Smartphone bag in imitation leather with a metal decoration at the front, a detachable, adjustable strap with metal fasteners at the ends, and three card compartments at the back. Width 9.7 cm. Height 16 cm.
Cardigan in soft, purl-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Turban in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Loafers in suede with pointed toes and tassels at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a turtle neck, zip at the top and long sleeves. Unlined.
Sandals with straps at the front and elastic heel straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
High profile boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, boot lacing and a tab with a metal fastener at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles. Heel 2.4 cm.
Wide off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication at the back and short balloon sleeves in a double layer with narrow, concealed elastic at the cuffs.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Handbag in imitation leather with decorative metal details and zips, and two adjustable handles at the top with metal fasteners. One large compartment with four inner compartments, one with a zip and one with a twist lock. One open inner compartment. Lined. Size 15x25x35 cm.
Straight-cut shirt in an airy viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with picot trims around the neckline and armholes. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Sleeveless top in an airy, hole-patterned cotton dobby weave with lace shoulder straps and lace trims at the top and down the front. Elastication at the top of the back and an elasticated, gathered seam at the waist.

Lightweight gilet in nylon with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Small stand-up collar that can be folded in and secured with a press-stud to form a V-neck. Press-studs down the front and side pockets. The gilet is easy to pack into the storage bag it is supplied with. Size of storage bag 10x22 cm.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a chunky-knit alpaca blend with low dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, gathered cups and ties at the back and at the back of the neck.
Jacquard-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated, roll-edge tops.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers woven in wool blend with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the side. Welt back pocket, and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases front and back, satin stripes down the sides and a slit at the back of the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Block-patterned T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen, a stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Pockets in the side seams, one inner pocket with a press-stud, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Mittens knitted in a wool blend with a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.
Short-sleeved, straight-cut tunic in light sweatshirt fabric with cotton poplin flounces.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Dungaree shorts in woven fabric with a double-layered front and open back. Shoulder straps with adjustable fasteners, a tie belt at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and hood with embroidery and appliqués at the top. Kangaroo pockets, long, printed raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in jacquard-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric. Seamless.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Baby Exclusive. Textured top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Twisted seams at the front and short slits in the sides.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains decorated with small plastic beads and round pendants. Adjustable length, 45-53 cm.
Joggers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes along the sides. Size 150x200 cm.
Trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length dress in a cool Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and deep V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with a slit and cuffs, and a low rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and short legs.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
